reviews.review_msg: She is a tough grader and the average grades in the course on every assignment were pretty low. Her feedback tended to be pretty nebulous and didn't give much direction on how to improve in the future. I found I didn't learn that much relevant material and I didn't enjoy the assignments. Some people seemed to like her but it wasn't for me.

This class is a joke, just like the prof. She is rude, takes way too long to mark, boring, too much history nothing about GSWS. Marks SO unreasonably. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS! She does not care about students. Rambles. I cannot stress how unreasonably she marks. I give this class and prof a hard F! Cancels class cuz she's moving but we paid for it!
